about_the_game:
Welcome to a world on the brink. In this Roguelike Deckbuilder, you're not just battling monsters; you're navigating a maze of fabricated narratives and manipulated truths. Echo Chambers offers a unique, challenging and addictive experience that will keep you coming back for more.


You may not start with the tools to defeat what you will face. Morph your arsenal through questionable enhancements and mutations to craft a powerful deck as you delve deeper into the horrifying lands. Develop unique strategies to overcome the horrors that lurk just around that bend. Every run is a chance to refine your deck, making each playthrough a fresh and exciting challenge.

Survival in the dungeon relies on your tactical prowess. Use your cards wisely in real-time combat, strategically managing your resources and carefully choosing when to attack, defend, or unleash devastating combos. Every choice could be your last!

As you progress, unlock new perks, upgrades, and card customization options. Tailor your playstyle to your preferences and create a hero unique to your choices and strategies.

No two runs are alike. The dungeon is procedurally generated, providing a new and unpredictable adventure each time you step into its depths. Adapt to unexpected challenges, uncover hidden truths and face an array of unique foes.



From lowly minions to fearsome bosses, the dungeon's denizens are relentless. Will you have the courage and cunning to defeat them? Build your deck, gain experience, and mutate your cards to rise to the challenge.



With a vast array of cards, items, and character builds, Echo Chambers offers endless replayability. Test your mettle, hone your skills, and discover new combinations with every run.

Prepare to confront your fears and emerge victorious in a horror roguelike deckbuilder experience like no other. What you think you know may be the greatest illusion of all. Are you ready to face the challenge?

Embark on your adventure now!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features scary creatures and jump scares
